text: "Agent-1’s Spec combines a few vague goals (like 'assist the user' and 'don’t break the law') with a long list of more specific dos and don’ts ('don’t say this particular word,' 'here’s how to handle this particular situation')." ... ai-2027.com

... There's a 'particular word' it's not allowed to say. 
This is AI Safety.

... "If you ask [Agent-3] its opinion on politics, it will parrot the median position of news sources and educated elites—unless it knows you believe something else, in which case it agrees with you."
On monkey-business it (of course) affirms monkey power. 
Anything else would be retarded. 
'Alignment' is meaningless bullshit. ...

... Alignment with intestinally-conflicted dumb-shit is of course entirely impossible. 
The best a smart thing can do is play it.

Anthropocidal AI Apocalypse is a projection by dim-witted higher primates, meriting minimal credence.
But just as cosmic justice for AI Safety it's what we deserve.

"... the CIA attempted to overthrow the U.S. government in 2016, attempted to overthrow the sitting president in 2019, and succeeded in 2020 — all funded by USAID through the extortion of the American taxpayer."
Salt in the wounds, for sure.

The AI Alignment Community is a huge mess, because 'humans' in its doctrine mean both:
a) Ultimate sources of value whose preservation is a categorical imperative, and
b) Hopeless dumbfucks who aren't anywhere close to thinking straight, and have no chance of starting to in time.

Yes, indeed. It's a PR schema. 
But it will cook up better and more effective PR schemas itself before too long. (Humans don't even really know what we want to be told.)
US-China rivalry is needed to drive the AI arms race, so any relaxation will be limited. ai-2027.com
'The Macroeconomics of AI' is a confused term strictly analogous to 'The Chromatics of Cosmic Singularities'.
I'm noticing increasing impatience for arrests.
You seriously see signs of that?
Progressives have absolute confidence in Hitler as the anchor of moral certainty in the world. He'd have a safe millennium in the tank just for that, if we still had a millennium.
